modules.name: Introduction
modules.description: PrismERP Pricing System is a flexible and comprehensive pricing system accomodating customers' needs in a cost effective manner.  The pricing system requires certain data to calculate the taylored price for your needs.

modules.name: Functional Areas
modules.description: Features in PrismERP are seggregated by functional areas and business processes.

modules.name: Taylored Parameter Values
modules.description: PrismERP accomodates small, medium and large enterprises with its taylored pricing system. PrismERP is highly scalable and adapts modern caching and background processing techniques. The pricinng system takes these parameters as input and provides a taylored pricing suited for your business
